newsitem.title: USA: Raytheon to perform satellite study.
newsitem.headline: Raytheon to perform satellite study.

text.p: Raytheon Co said on Thursday that it was selected to perform a study for Constellation Communications Inc's planned low Earth orbit satellite system.

Constellation Communications recently announced that the award to Raytheon E-Systems is worth at least $300 million over the next three years, but actual award of the ground segment contract has yet to be made and the ultimate value is yet to be determined, Raytheon said.
